oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1960-03-26 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from March 26, 1960. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Ernest Tubb (host/performer), guest performer Skeeter Davis, and regular performers Archie Campbell, Tommy Jackson, Chet Atkins, Minnie Pearl, and Del Wood. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 1068th broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Chet Atkins; Minnie Pearl; Archie Campbell; Ernest Tubb; Skeeter Davis; Del Wood
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Ernest Tubb introduces Chet Atkins -- Wabash Blues (Chet Atkins) -- Ernest Tubb introduces Minnie Pearl -- Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl, Archie Campbell) -- The Proof Is In The Puffing (Ernest Tubb) (recording) -- Grant Turner introduces Skeeter Davis -- Homebreaker (Skeeter Davis) -- Grant Turner introduces Del Wood -- River Boat Ride (Del Wood) -- Grant Turner and Ernest Tubb talk -- Next Time (Ernest Tubb) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Ernest Tubb) -- Camel Cigarettes jingle -- Network announcements (Grant Turner)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Turner, Grant; Sloan, Ralph; Tennessee Travelers; Atkins, Chet; Wood, Del; Jackson, Tommy; Campbell, Archie; Minnie Pearl; Emmons, Buddy; Garrett, Bobby (Steel guitarist); Tubb, Ernest, 1914-1984; Davis, Skeeter
